name: Suck My Deagle, Dragon
description:
It's your destiny... 

 A dragon has yet again appeared here in this world, and you are the chosen champion of your city Hereafter.

I randomly thought about this game after finishing a 3D course that I have been learning, It's about you shooting a dragon with your deagle :D. 

There's a lot of stuff that I haven't put because of the game jam schedule, but It's playable and I did not properly balanced it so hehehe.

I am planning to update the game soon because I want to add a credit scene where you can see the amazing people who created the assets that I used, and I also want to put those and that :D.

Have Fun!
